benefits.about: Sharekhan has launched a new platform called 'Espresso' through a separate company, hence venturing into discount brokerage business. The customers will have to pay brokerage only when there is profit from intraday trade.
howWork: Share the link with your friends and family
Ask them to click the link and apply for ICICI Direct Demat Link.
Earn existing Deals when they open the account.
tnc: Age should be minimum 23+ and a resident of INDIA.
Your referral should open the account using your links only.
Mobile should be linked with Aadhar number and having a PAN card.
User Confirms OTP will be sent on the mobile number linked/registered with Aadhar Card.
keys: Brokerage Applicable only when you profit
benefits.offer: Open an Espresso Demat account today & Get Money FLIX subscription (1yr) worth Rs.1999 for FREE! Money FLIX is an OTT platform that helps traders & investors learn new investing strategies.
